revised_title: Resonant Magnetoacoustic Absorption in HoVO4: Theoretical Dependence and Experimental Results
tldr: This article investigates the resonant magnetoacoustic absorption in HoVO4, a type of enhanced nuclear magnet. The authors confirm the theoretical dependences of the absorption intensity on the frequency and derive values for the magnetoelastic coupling coefficients. They also compare the spin-lattice relaxation rates for the direct process with previous measurements, providing a deeper understanding of the material's properties.
